text: org.apache.catalina.realm.RealmBase.authenticate(GSSContext, boolean) does not log when an incomplete GSS context is passed, it simply returns null. Given that an authenticator is incorrectly implemented, this would be unnnoticed. Many resources on the net never care about context completion and think pass token and this is it.
creator: 1983-01-06@gmx.net

text:
Thanks for the report and the patch.
Fixed in:
- trunk for 9.0.0.M14 onwards
- 8.5.x for 8.5.9 onwards
- 8.0.x for 8.0.40 onwards
- 7.0.x for 7.0.74 onwards
creator: markt@apache.org
